entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:42 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 08:37 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: NW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:57 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 07:57 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:57 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
